verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I cannot come before my righteous Holy Lord

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: And offer to Him worldly things I do not need

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: For He wants me to give, a heart that's truly His

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: An offering of the highest price

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: A servant whom, the Lord can use

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: I will not offer anything that costs me nothing

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: I'll place before Him nothing less than my very best

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: And if I'm called to sacrifice

verse.name: v11
verse.lines: It will be worthy of my Christ

verse.name: v12
verse.lines: To serve Him is my goal, how could I withhold

verse.name: v13
verse.lines: Whatever's mine He's given me, it's not my own

verse.name: v15
verse.lines: Whatever He requires, it is my desire

verse.name: v16
verse.lines: Whatever He may need from me,

verse.name: v17
verse.lines: I'll pay the cost, gain or loss
